duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the financial close processes for the US and Americas Region.
Prepare, review, and analyze journal entries to the general ledger.
Complete and/or review monthly and quarterly balance sheet account reconciliations.
Research transactions, propose entries, and assist with reporting up through leadership.
Review and approve work prepared by the FSC while providing oversight and performance feedback.
Prepare schedules and other deliverables for internal and external auditors.
Be an enthusiastic ambassador of the company culture to support the continued integration of the legacy firms and collaborative work environment across functions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field (Master's preferred)
